name: award
description: Add, view, and remove member awards

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose awards to view (defaults to you)

options.name: add
options.description: Add an award to a member

options.name: user
options.description: The user to add an award to

options.name: award
options.description: The description of the award to add

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove an award from a member

options.name: user
options.description: The user to remove an award from

options.name: award-id
options.description: The id of the award to remove (leave blank to view the IDs of a users awards)
